 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (IAudioStreamOutListener)

Detailed Description

Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an AudioRecord has reached for periodic updates on the progress of the record head, as set by AudioStreamOut#setPalybackListener().

The following example demonstrates how to use the IAudioStreamOutListener

 // MyIAudioStreamOutListener

 class MyIAudioStreamOutListener : IAudioStreamOutListener {
 public:
     MyIAudioStreamOutListener();
     virtual ~MyIAudioStreamOutListener();
     void onPeriodicNotification(AudioStreamOut* out);
 };


 // MyIAudioStreamOutListener

 void MyIAudioStreamOutListener::onPeriodicNotification(AudioStreamOut* out) {
    // Do something
    //.....

 }


 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstanceState){

       //Initial argument of getFitBufferSize function.
       int32_t sampleRateHz = 44100;
       int32_t channel = AudioControl::CHANNEL_CONFIGURATION_MONO;
       int32_t audioFormat = AudioControl::ENCODING_PCM_16BIT;

     // Increase the ringer volume.
     int32_t recBufSize = AudioStreamIn::getFitBufferSize(sampleRateHz,
               channel, audioFormat);

     // New a AudioStreamIn instance.
       AudioStreamIn *mpAudioStreamIn = new AudioStreamIn(MediaRecorder::AUDIOSOURCE_MIC, sampleRateHz,
               channel, audioFormat, recBufSize);

       // New a listener
     MyAudioStreamOutListener *list = new MyAudioStreamOutListener();

     // Set a listener
     mpAudioStreamIn->setFrameNotifyListener(list);

     // ...

 }

virtual void gaia::media::IAudioStreamOutListener::onPeriodicNotificationOut ( const AudioStreamOut &  aso) [virtual]
